sub_title: Biology Teacher at Rotterdam International Secondary School
summary:
Experienced Science Teacher with a demonstrated history of working in the primary/secondary education industry. Skilled in Lesson Planning, Tutoring, Educational Technology, Classroom Management, Curriculum Development, Inquiry-Based Instruction, and Authentic Assessment. Strong education professional with a Master of Education (M.Ed.) focused in Biology Education from George Mason University. 
Strong interest in gamification and the EdTech industry, and finding ways for educators to use tech to make teaching and learning more engaging.
